Definition: You will be given a public comment from online platforms. Your task is to classify the comment into one of two classes: insult or non-insult. Insult is defined as any language or act that is disrespectful or scornfully abusive.

Positive Examples.explanation: This comment is insult because it is scornful and disrespectful.
